Summary: i saw 4 glowing orange circles real low flashing randomly in a shape of a backwards L leaning
divs: sighting detailsit was about 10pm or so..i had jus dropped off a friend of mine at his house. i drove down the street to go back home it is da last street beyond that is the river..i looked towards my right and i saw four glowing spheres\circles with an orange glow to them kinda dim not a real bright glow! it was in the shape of a backwards l leaning on its corner! i got the worst chills ever! i knew for a fact it was a ufo! it wasn't very high maybe 30 ft high and 30 to 40 yards from the st i was driving on! it lasted a few minutes then one at a time they slowly faded away! the next morning or night i really dnt recall. my father was watching the news and there had been a sighting in phoenix az of the very same orange spheres i had seen in mammoth..maybe the same night maybe a say later im not certain! many years later i was telling a friend of mine this story in oracle az. when i had fonished telling him this story(and i put this on my family) there was a big flash the same orange color of the spheres i had saw! it was a huge flash! it made me feel very scared as if i was being heard...maybe even being warned not to tell my story again! at least that's what it felt like!
trends: There have been no other sightings in in between tucson and pho
This sighting has never been favorited.
